room_title: Escape room "Wrath of Anubis" by Race to Escape in Tampa
room_address: 2435 US Highway 19 N Suite 101 Holiday, FL 34691
room_description:
Anubis, the Egyptian god of the afterlife, is about to unleash his army of messengers to punish all those who are living for the ones who decimated the tomb of his great King Tut and the sacred burial sites that lay in the Valley of the Kings.
You have to go inside the kingâ€™s sacred tomb located in the ancient halls of the great pyramids to fix what was set wrong by thievery tomb raiders in order to close the back door which was inadvertently opened linking the underworld to the land of the living.
Watch out, one wrong move and you may incur the wrath of the mummy who may be leering out from the shadows watching your every move. Save us all from the Wrath of Anubis and before the land of the living becomes the land of the dead!
